pr_title: Create environment info UI for developer menu

timeline.bodyText: Instead of passing the TextView, keep it here, and then change the return of the displayEnvironmentInfo() to a String. If you get the displayEnvironmentInfo() into a ~simple text factory, it will be east to add a unit test over it, too.
timeline.author: jamesonwilliams

replies.bodyText: I removed the TextView parameter from displayEnvironmentInfo() (setting the text of the TextView in onCreateView instead), but I set the return type for displayEnvironmentInfo() to a SpannableStringBuilder instead of a String in order to retain the styling applied to the Spannables appended to the SpannableStringBuilder.
replies.author: eeatonaws
